channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- Database Performance Analyzer (DPA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- Database Performance Analyzer (DPA)

item.title: CVE-2022-38110|2024-08-03T10:45:52.561Z -- solarwinds -- database%20performance%20analyzer%20%28dpa%29
item.description: In Database Performance Analyzer (DPA) 2022.4 and older releases, certain URL vectors are susceptible to authenticated reflected cross-site scripting.

item.title: CVE-2022-38112|2024-08-03T10:45:52.686Z -- solarwinds -- database%20performance%20analyzer%20%28dpa%29
item.description: In DPA 2022.4 and older releases, generated heap memory dumps contain sensitive information in cleartext.
